name: Bev & Platt
description:
Bev and Platt are on a mission to mitigate the excessive littering of planks on their home riverbank and have decided to use the materials to build a dam for Bev's great aunt Eve - 

Press SPACE to move logs together - fit the correct logs together as much as you can to earn a higher score!

The higher the score, the faster the planks come at you - with 5 levels in total.

Submitted for the GMTK Game Jam -

A really simple game, nothing too exciting but it was a fun experience nontheless :)

Music Credits:

https://www.dl-sounds.com/royalty-free/pizz-bass-loop/

Mac version may or may not work.

Transitions between levels may produce visual glitches...

Downloaded files contain particles as well, but web version does not.
